name: Breads
description: Handcrafted small-batch Sourdough, French, and Italian breads. Enjoy our artisanal loaves, custom orders, and fresh dinner rolls, made with care and the finest ingredients.

name: Cakes, Cheesecakes & Cupcakes
description: From classic favorites to inventive seasonal creations, our cakes, cheesecakes, and cupcakes are made to delight. Any cake flavor can be made into cupcakes, and we happily take custom orders. New flavors are added monthly—check back often to see what’s fresh from the oven!

items.name: Tiered Cakes
items.description: Tailored Layer Cake (Check with us), 12 Layer Chocolate Cake, Strawberry, Banana Toffee, Birthday Cake Funfetti, Coconut, Lotus Chocolate, Olive Oil Lemon Basil.
specs: Each cake features three or more generous layers, filled and topped with a variety of premium ingredients.
Signature flavors include Red Velvet, Carrot, Banana, Coffee, and Lemon.

Fillings range from timeless to indulgent: Vanilla Bean Custard, Strawberry, Raspberry, Blueberry compote, Caramel, Chocolate, Banana Mousse, Lemon Curd, Coffee Cream, Oreo, Lotus, and seasonal favorites like Passion fruit, Mango, Peach, and more.
Our house-made frostings includes but not limited to French buttercream in Vanilla, Chocolate, White Chocolate, Salted Caramel, Mocha, and Lotus.
Additional frosting options include Cream Cheese, Marshmallow, Whipped Cream, Ganache.

items.name: Bundt and Coffee Cakes
items.description: Sour Cream Pound Cake, Vanilla Chocolate Marble Cake, Lemon Pound Cake with Lemon Curd, Spiced Coffee with Streusel Toppings.

items.name: Crepe Cakes
items.description: Tiramisu, Matcha, Crème Brûlée, Milk Tea, Chocolate Mocha

items.name: Cupcakes & Muffins
items.description: Custard Castella, Chocolate Espresso Cream, Rosemary Orange, Lemon Blueberry, Multigrain Health, Apple Granola, Ginger Orange Crunch

items.name: Cheesecake
items.description: Baked, No-Bake Cheesecake, and  Burnt Basque Cheesecake  served with a variety of toppings as Strawberry Compote, Blueberry Compote, Raspberry Compote, Salted Caramel, Chocolate Sauce, Seasonal Fruit Compote, Dulce De Leche

name: Brunch
description: Our brunch menu brings together comforting classics and savory delights made from scratch. From fluffy quiches and loaded egg bakes to herb-scented biscuits and crêpes, each dish is crafted with care and rich flavors. Customize your plate with a variety of fillings, sauces, and seasonal ingredients—perfect for leisurely mornings and hearty appetites.

items.name: Quiche
items.description: Lorraine: Bacon and Swiss, Mediterranean:Tomato Basil and Feta, French: Mushroom and Goat Cheese

items.name: Egg Bake Casserole
items.description: Potato Strata topped with eggs, and fillings including: Mushrooms, Sausage, veggies, and Cheeses. Sauces include: Black Peppercorn Gravy, Ranchero, Hollandaise and more.

items.name: Home Fries
items.description: Crispy oven baked Potatoes with roasted garlic and herbs. Add cheese, baccon and veggies : Onions, Mushrooms and peppers.

items.name: Savory Egg Crêpe
items.description: Filled with eggs, and cheese, extra fillings include: Sausage, mushrooms, chicken, and veggies

items.name: Savory Herb Scone
items.description: Parmesan and chive scone served warm

items.name: Buttermilk Biscuits
items.description: Classic, Cheese, Roasted Garlic and Herb, Bacon and Cheddar.

name: Pies, Cobblers & Galettes
description: Our pies, cobblers, and galettes celebrate the richness of seasonal fruit and timeless comfort. From buttery lattice-topped pies to rustic open-faced galettes and bubbling cobblers with golden biscuit crusts, each treat is made by hand with love and premium ingredients. Ask us about custom fillings and rotating seasonal specials!

items.name: Rustic Seasonal Galette
items.description: Free-form tart with options like cinnamon apples, grilled peaches with burrata, or stone fruits.

items.name: Berry Cobbler
items.description: Mixed seasonal berries baked with vanilla biscuit topping.

items.name: Pecan Pie
items.description: Toasted pecans in a rich brown sugar custard with flaky pie crust.

items.name: Pumpkin Pie
items.description: Pumpkin in a rich butternut custard with flaky pie crust.

items.name: Chocolate Cream Pie
items.description: Rich chocolate custard in a flaky pie crust with whipped cream and chocolate shavings

items.name: Apple Pie
items.description: Classic apple pie with flaky crust and spiced apple filling.

items.name: Banoffie Pie
items.description: Banana, toffee, and whipped cream in a graham cracker crust.

items.name: Lemon Meringue Pie
items.description: Tart and creamy lemon custard in a flaky pie crust with toasted meringue.

items.name: Peach Cobbler
items.description: Fresh peaches baked with vanilla biscuit topping.

name: Bamboloni
description: Our Bamboloni are handcrafted Italian doughnuts made from enriched brioche dough for an irresistibly soft, airy texture. Each one is filled with decadent creams, curds, or jams and finished with unique coatings for a perfect bite. We also offer custom flavors and seasonal varieties to keep things deliciously fresh.

items.name: Crème brûlée
items.description: Filled with French pastry cream with a burnt sugar crunch

items.name: Chocolate
items.description: Filled with chocolate pastry cream and coated with cocoa powder and sugar

items.name: Café Latte
items.description: Filled with coffee cream

items.name: Mexicano
items.description: Filled with dulce de leche and coated with cinnamon sugar

items.name: Thai Dream
items.description: Filled with coconut cream, mango mousse and coated with toasted coconut

items.name: Strawberry
items.description: Filled with strawberry jam and pastry cream

items.name: Lemon
items.description: Filled with lemon curd and topped with toasted marshmallow
